name: 'Birnam Woods' Trivia Game | 'West Wing' - Season 6 | 10 Questions

questions.text: The title of this episode is from what Shakespearean play?
questions.explanation:
Macbeth.

	A prophecy in "Macbeth" stated, "Fear not, till Birnam Wood do come to Dunsinane." The title is supposed to illustrate the movement that took place between Israel and Palestine.

questions.text: After Kate convinced Farad to go along with the right of Israelis to return to their country, what did Will suggest he take Kate along to do with him?
questions.explanation:
Buy a car.

	Kate agreed to talk to Farad about the right of return for Israeli refugees because she thought Farad liked her. After getting Farad to go along with the refugee return, she came back to give everyone the good news. Will then suggested he take her along when he buys a new car.

questions.text: Who went skeet shooting with Massar?
questions.explanation:
Toby.

	Massar warned Toby that his stance was incorrect, but Toby said it was the way they stood in Brooklyn. When he fired the gun, he fell back onto the ground.

questions.text: Toby made a reference to Rose Bud. What movie was that line from?
options: The Man Who Knew Too Much
One Flew Over The Cuckoo's Nest
questions.explanation:
Citizen Kane.

	The line "Rose Bud" was said by Orson Welles in the 1941 movie "Citizen Kane".

questions.text: To what state did Will suggest the Israeli refugees go?
questions.explanation:
Montana.

	Will (on subject of refugees): "I hear there's room in Montana. They can rent a cabin and try to secede from the Union."

Yes.

	The President told Leo to have a list of replacements ready for him to see before Leo left.

questions.text: What was the name of aircraft carrier that General Alexander said planes took off from to destroy a terrorist camp?
questions.explanation:
Abraham Lincoln.

	CJ was briefing the press on how the peace talks were going and let General Alexander brief the press on the destruction of the Ein Hawa terrorist camp. The President had ordered Alexander to destroy the terrorist camp in "NSF Thurmont".

questions.text: Leo suggested to CJ that either one of them or the Assistant Deputy Secretary for ________ should get on the morning talk shows. Who else did Leo suggest?
questions.explanation:
Fishery Exploitation.

	When CJ asked Leo what they should say to the morning shows, Leo suggested, "Shut up while we're trying to get them to stop killing each other".

questions.text: When returning to the White House, which one of the Senior Staff members did Josh run into first?
questions.explanation:
CJ.

	Carol was briefing CJ on the morning shows that she would be on and Josh came up to them. CJ hugged him for a long time and then they talked about Donna, Colin, and Donna's mom.

questions.text: Was anyone around Leo when he had his heart attack?
questions.explanation:
No.

	After Leo resigned, he walked into the woods and had a heart attack. He lost consciousness in the woods. The next morning, Josh tried to call him to let him know the peace agreement worked, but he couldn't get him. When the show ended, Marine One was flying over Camp David and Leo's cell phone could be heard ringing in the woods.
